titleStmt.title: Ministers dues and peoples duty; or A bill of accounts between ministers and people: shewing vvhat people owe unto their ministers; which may also serve to mind ministers, what they are to expect from their people. By Sam. Clark M.A. sometimes fellow of Pembroke-Hall in Cambridg, and now minister of Grendon Under-wood in Buckinghamshire.
titleStmt.author: Clark, Samuel, 1626-1701.

titleStmt.title: Ministers dues and peoples duty; or A bill of accounts between ministers and people: shewing vvhat people owe unto their ministers; which may also serve to mind ministers, what they are to expect from their people. By Sam. Clark M.A. sometimes fellow of Pembroke-Hall in Cambridg, and now minister of Grendon Under-wood in Buckinghamshire.
titleStmt.author: Clark, Samuel, 1626-1701.
Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by A.M. for William Miller at the Golden Acorn in St Pauls Church-yard, near the little north-door,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The peoples duty to their pastors.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 29 1660"; the second 1 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
